about:
I am a tech enthusiast with a strong foundation in programming, skilled in C, C++, Python, Java, SQL, PHP, and JavaScript. My experience spans both frontend and backend development, working with HTML, CSS, TypeScript, Expo, Node.js, and MySQL.


I have a growing interest in machine learning (ML) and deep learning (DL), where I consider myself an intermediate in Python and a beginner in ML/DL. I am passionate about applying AI to real-world problems, particularly in handwritten text recognition (HTR), gait recognition for Parkinsonâ€™s disease detection, and AI-driven strategy games using deep reinforcement learning.
